title: Development Process for Blended Learning-Based Mathematics Education Communities of Practice (CoPs)

context.prior_knowledge: Mathematics pedagogical content knowledge and practical application experience
context.additional_context: A program for in-service professionals to strengthen collaborative problem-solving competencies in mathematics education settings.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three operational principles of Communities of Practice (CoPs) in blended learning environments
Learners can collaborate with peer practitioners using mobile microlearning to propose solutions for mathematics education challenges
Learners can apply knowledge gained from CoPs activities to fieldwork and derive at least two improvement cases
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
